unnormalised: RCB-k aapan khel kombhirponnan vaddocho poddtolo; CSK virudh fakt 150 run korun favo zaunchena. Virat-an hea season-ant 50+ averaging korun portun yeycho poddtolo!
normalised: R-C-B-chen khel sudharpachi khup goroz asa; C-S-K virudh fakt dedh sho run korun cholchhena. Virat-an hea season-an punha pannaask plus average haddpak zai!
text: RCB-k aapan khel kombhirponnan vaddocho poddtolo; CSK virudh fakt 150 run korun favo zaunchena. Virat-an hea season-ant 50+ averaging korun portun yeycho poddtolo!
